createStory.sample.paragraph: Hello, welcome to the Viajei.blog story editor, where you can create your travel stories and share them with the world. To get started, hover over me, and you'll see a menu of options appear on the left. With it, you can add images, links, and more. Give it a try!
createStory.sample.heading: Create titles and lists like this:
createStory.sample.paragraph2: From your third post onwards, we won't display this tutorial anymore! Don't forget to delete these example blocks we left here. To do that, follow the steps shown in the image below:
createStory.sample.image.caption: Next to the 'add' button, you'll find the option to edit the block you're working on. If it's a title, you can change its size and importance (Heading 3, Heading 4, ...). By the way, here's the caption for your photo in case you want to add one.
